description: front relief panel of white dog wearing hat, ruffled collar and shoes, with 2 clowns in background; red box and platform on back
inscription:
Inscription and Sticker

on front, in black: [I\'m a star performer / Known as / \"Clever Dick.\" / Place a penny / on my nose / Then I will / do my trick.]
markings: on bottom, on sticker: [Clever Dick--14 / 1982-1500 / 76-800 / AD 80-1100 / Mosler 1300]
title: "Clever Dick" mechanical bank
